name: Zen Sand: Relaxing Games
description:
Zen Sand is a relaxing game of logic that is easy to play but hard to master. The objective is simple: Place bamboo stalks to guide the flowing sand into the vases.

Check out what players are saying:

"Reminds me a bit of Quell. I'm impressed." - D.K.
"This game gives an excellent zen experience. I loved it!" - J.S.
"Keeps me trying 'one more time' to get a perfect score" - R.H.

- Objective: Place bamboo stalks strategically to guide the sand into the vases
- Relax with soothing sounds in a zen-like atmosphere
- Unlock ancient Chinese proverbs!
- Game Center leaderboard and achievements!

Challenge your brain with 64 mind bending levels! The first 16 levels are free and the rest can be purchased.
